thread.title: New York City Public Advocate To Announce Attorney General Bid

author: Mike Vilensky
title: New York City Public Advocate To Announce Attorney General Bid

organizations.name: new york city public advocate to announce attorney general bid new york city public advocate

text:
New York City Public Advocate Letitia James is expected to announce her run for New York Attorney General on Wednesday, said people familiar with her plans, amid a scramble to fill Eric Schneidermanâ€™s former role.
On Tuesday, Ms. James, a Democrat who was re-elected last year, registered a campaign fundraising account and scheduled an announcement for Wednesday afternoon. She is a front-runner for the job, with a high profile in New York City and the support of an array of Democrats.
...
